TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed IntegerProperty extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies the integer properties of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The IntegerProperty enumeration represents a set of integer properties that describe visual style elements. The IntegerProperty values are used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetInteger%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to specify which property value to retrieve for the element that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> currently represents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty AlphaLevel = int32(2402)

Docs.summary: The alpha value for an icon, between 0 and 255.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty AlphaThreshold = int32(2415)

Docs.summary: The minimum alpha value of a solid pixel, between 0 and 255.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty BorderSize = int32(2403)

Docs.summary: The size of the border line for elements with a filled-border background.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty GlyphIndex = int32(2418)

Docs.summary: The index into the font for font-based glyphs.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty GradientRatio1 = int32(2406)

Docs.summary: The amount of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ColorProperty.GradientColor1?displayProperty=fullName> to use in a color gradient. The sum of the five properties must equal 255.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty GradientRatio2 = int32(2407)

Docs.summary: The amount of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ColorProperty.GradientColor2?displayProperty=fullName> to use in a color gradient. The sum of the five properties must equal 255.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty GradientRatio3 = int32(2408)

Docs.summary: The amount of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ColorProperty.GradientColor3?displayProperty=fullName> to use in a color gradient. The sum of the five properties must equal 255.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty GradientRatio4 = int32(2409)

Docs.summary: The amount of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ColorProperty.GradientColor4?displayProperty=fullName> to use in a color gradient. The sum of the five properties must equal 255.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty GradientRatio5 = int32(2410)

Docs.summary: The amount of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ColorProperty.GradientColor5?displayProperty=fullName> to use in a color gradient. The sum of the five properties must equal 255.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty Height = int32(2417)

Docs.summary: The height of an element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty ImageCount = int32(2401)

Docs.summary: The number of state images in multiple-image file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty MinDpi1 = int32(2420)

Docs.summary: The minimum dots per inch (DPI) that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile1?displayProperty=fullName> was designed for.

Docs.summary: The minimum DPI that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile2?displayProperty=fullName> was designed for.

Docs.summary: The size of progress bar elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty ProgressSpaceSize = int32(2412)

Docs.summary: The size of spaces between progress bar elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty RoundCornerHeight = int32(2405)

Docs.summary: A percentage value that represents the height of a rounded corner, from 0 to 100.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty RoundCornerWidth = int32(2404)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IntegerProperty TrueSizeStretchMark = int32(2419)

Docs.summary: A percentage value indicating how far a fixed-size element will stretch when the target exceeds the source.
